data.title: EōS Fitness Set to Transform Former Movie Theater into Premier Fitness Center in Copperfield Area
meta_keywords: what happened to the Studio Movie Grill in Copperfield
data.meta_description: EōS Fitness is transforming the former Studio Movie Grill in the Copperfield area into a state-of-the-art fitness center, set to open in 2025 with a variety of equipment, classes, and personal training at affordable rates.
data.text:
Source: EōS Fitness

Cy-Fair, get ready for the dawn of a new fitness era. The former Studio Movie Grill in the Copperfield area will soon be invigorated as a prime fitness center. EōS Fitness, a titan in the global fitness industry, has announced that it will be transforming the now defunct movie theater into a fully-equipped fitness facility. The 41,000 sq. ft. premises at 8580 Hwy 6, Houston, TX 77095, which has been vacant since March 2020, is set to be revived by EōS Fitness with its grand opening slated for 2025.

The new location will join five other EōS Fitness locations across the Greater Houston Area. The brand's expansion is part of a larger growth strategy, with over 150 locations currently in operation or on their way across states including Arizona, California, Florida, Nevada, Texas, and Utah.

Known for its High Value, Low Price (HVLP)® gyms, EōS Fitness has built a reputation for fostering an inclusive and welcoming environment for fitness enthusiasts at all levels. EōS Fitness aims to revolutionize the Houston fitness scene with its state-of-the-art facility, offering a plethora of fitness equipment, high-energy group classes, and extensive personal training options, with membership starting at just $9.99 per month.

The fitness center will feature cutting-edge strength equipment, promising free weights up to 150 lbs., and the latest in power lifting stations. EōS Smart Strength Equipment, a unique fitness innovation, will also feature on the gym floor, serving to adapt and adjust to individual strength and cadence, giving users a completely tailored workout experience.

Mobile Sidebar Ad

Patrons can also look forward to diverse cardio options, complete with personalized viewing screens, certified personal training, group workouts, a MOVEōS Cinema cardio room, and a Recovery Room with massage chairs. The facility will house spacious locker rooms, a sauna, the EōS Yard® Functional Training Area, and an on-demand towel service.

The upcoming EōS Fitness center further adds to its appeal by offering over 60 group fitness classes every week, each curated to deliver maximum results and fun. The brand is currently curating a schedule of diverse and engaging classes.

Named after the Greek Goddess of Dawn, EōS Fitness symbolizes the dawn of each member’s fitness journey. With its High Value, Low Price (HVLP)® gyms, EōS Fitness offers an affordable, yet encompassing fitness experience aims to cater to everyone's unique fitness needs, whether it's cardio day or a heavy lifting session, a zen yoga class or some heart-pumping Zumba®.
